trans-unit.source: Provides a friendly name for XAML usage of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition" /> 컬렉션의 XAML 사용에 대한 친숙한 이름을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> type to define a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition> objects as a resource.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> 종류의 컬렉션을 정의 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition> 리소스로 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> as a resource with the x:Key `3ControlSizeDef` and reference it from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.GroupSizeDefinitions%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection> X:key 인 리소스로 `3ControlSizeDef` 에서 참조 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.GroupSizeDefinitions%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection" /> class.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinitionBaseCollection" /> class.
A new instance of this class.
